page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Over and Under the Moon}is a skipping game. Two children turn a rope and the other children run under it. When they reach the other side they turn, run back and jump over it. They carry on in this way until someone trips or gets caught in the rope. This person then takes a turn on the rope. {Sheep Sheep}is a group game with one person on it. The child who is on it stands in the middle of the play- ground and the rest of the children go to one end of the playground. These children try to run to the other end without being caught by the one who is on it.If you are caught you help to catch the other children. Once there are three catchers they stand against the wall at the start to make it easier for the others to run across. When all are caught a new game starts with the first one caught as catcher.
